{{cpp/title|wcsstr}}
{{cpp/string/wide/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|cwchar}}
{{dcl|
const wchar_t* wcsstr( const wchar_t* dest, const wchar_t* src );
}}
{{dcl|1=
      wchar_t* wcsstr(       wchar_t* dest, const wchar_t* src );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Finds the first occurrence of the wide string {{c|src}} in the wide string pointed to by {{c|dest}}. The terminating null characters are not compared.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|dest|pointer to the null-terminated wide string to examine}}
{{par|src|pointer to the null-terminated wide string to search for}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
Pointer to the first character of the found substring in {{c|dest}}, or a null pointer if no such substring is found. If {{c|src}} points to an empty string, {{c|dest}} is returned.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;clocale&gt;
#include &lt;cwchar&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
 
int main()
{
    wchar_t const* origin = L"アルファ, ベータ, ガンマ, アルファ, ベータ, ガンマ.";
    wchar_t const* target = L"ベータ";
    wchar_t const* result = origin;
 
    std::setlocale(LC_ALL, "en_US.utf8");
    std::wcout &lt;&lt; L"Substring to find: \"" &lt;&lt; target &lt;&lt; L"\"\n"
               &lt;&lt; L"String to search: \"" &lt;&lt; origin &lt;&lt; L"\"\n\n";
 
    for (; (result = std::wcsstr(result, target)) != nullptr; ++result)
        std::wcout &lt;&lt; L"Found: \"" &lt;&lt; result &lt;&lt; L"\"\n";
}
|p=true
|output=
Substring to find: "ベータ"
String to search: "アルファ, ベータ, ガンマ, アルファ, ベータ, ガンマ."

Found: "ベータ, ガンマ, アルファ, ベータ, ガンマ."
Found: "ベータ, ガンマ."
}}
